nodes.text: Calamarian also known as Mon Cal was a writing system used by the Mon Calamari. Some of the commands used on the MC85 Star Cruiser, the Raddus were in Calamarian. Resistance technician, Rose Tico disphered the writing to open the hangar bay doors, saving Resistance pilot, Poe Dameron.

Calamarian first appeared on a screen in the lead story Rose Knows part of sixth issue of Star Wars Adventures. The story was written by Delilah S. Dawson and illustrated by Derek Charm. In Star Wars Legends, Calamarian is known as Mon Calamarian and first appeared in the novel Dark Apprentice.
